description: An RFI to determine the interest and capability of businesses to supply and deliver office chairs to CRA, understand challenges in the industry, and inform future procurements.
full_summary:
# Canada Revenue Agency: Call for Industry Stakeholders

### Project Overview

The Canada Revenue Agency (CRA) is seeking feedback from various industry stakeholders on their willingness and ability to supply and deliver office chairs to the CRA with a scope of work similar to that outlined in the attached "Sample RFP" document.

### Objectives
The purpose of this Request for Information (RFI) is to achieve the following key objectives:

* Determine the interest and capability of diverse businesses, including Indigenous and small and medium enterprises (SMEs), to supply and deliver office chairs to the CRA as described in the RFI attachment.
* Understand the potential challenges encountered by businesses in responding to a Request for Proposal (RFP) similar to the sample RFP and inform future CRA procurements for office chairs.

### Submission Requirements

* Suppliers are requested to provide a contact name, email address, and telephone number with their response.
* Electronic submissions only are accepted.
* Suppliers should submit their responses by the closing date specified on the [CanadaBuys](https://canadabuys.canada.ca) posting.

#### RFI Contact
* Christina Eryuzlu
* Email: <christina.eryuzlu@cra-arc.gc.ca>
* Telephone: (819) 588-5434

### RFI Document
The RFI document can be downloaded from the following links:

* English: <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/4750/rfi_e.pdf>
* French: <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/4750/ddr_f.pdf>

The Canada Revenue Agency is seeking industry stakeholders' input to inform future procurements. Suppliers are requested to submit their responses as outlined in the RFI document. Your time and consideration are appreciated.
